description_html:
Created by Phoenix Design for the AXOR brand, the AXOR Montreux collection merges traditional elegance with chic industrial design details and superior German engineering. Built for exceptional performance from expertly crafted individual components, the Belle Epoque inspired new kitchen collection includes faucets for several different applications.

The eye-catching AXOR Montreux 2-Spray Semi-Pro Kitchen swivels 360 degrees and comes equipped with an easily retractable spray head with two spray options. This is complemented by the AXOR Montreux HighArc Kitchen Faucet, which features the same silhouette but at a lower height and without the decorative coils. Both models feature subtle engraving indicating “Hot” and “Cold,” imbuing them with an heirloom quality. Both are eco-friendly models that run at an efficient flow rate of 1.75GPM. Adding versatility, the line also includes prep, bar, and potfiller models.

Standard finishes include Chrome, Steel Optik, and Polished Nickel. Custom options through the AXOR FinishPlus program include: Brushed Nickel, Polished Nickel, Brushed Gold Optic, Polished Gold Optic, Brushed Red Gold, Polished Red Gold, Brushed Bronze, Polished Bronze, Brushed Black Chrome, and Polished Black Chrome.
